contest-rule.title: Contest Rules
contest-rule.full-html-rule:
Start your Tet Story and Catch your Lì Xì - a 30,000,000vnđ travel tour. Only by Tet-your-way 01 picture and story, so easy to hunt Traveloka's Luck! Join now!

Step 1: Click "Show your Tet story".

Step 2: Choose a picture and tell Tet Your Way story.

* Note: The allowed format (JPG, JPEG, PNG, WEBP,...) and < 10 MB. Stories from 150-500 words.

Step 3: Send a story, call Drop Love from your friends and catch the Lì Xì!

Approved stories by Traveloka will appeared in Contest Homepage.

By participating in the contest, you agree for Traveloka to use the articles, images, videos and information you provide to post on Traveloka's media channels or for other purposes without any additional conditions , except for illegal activities.

Traveloka reserves the right to remove posts if the story content violates community standards.
thank-vote.sorry-voted: You've already dropped love for this story, find another one to drop love
thank-you.call-to-share: Hunt the Lì Xì by sharing to your friend and Drop Love, are you ready?

end-contest.note: The social contest ends at 24:00 on February 14, 2023. The winner will be announced after the final results from Traveloka and the judging panel.
end-contest.note-warning: Disclaimer: Entries submitted after the above timeframes will not be allowed to enter the contest.
